mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transfer_alarm ( TRANSFER_ALARM_SQ, SHOW_SQ, START_DATE, END_DATE, SEAT, PRICE, TRANSFER_ALARM_STAT, USER_SQ ) VALUES ( seq_transfer_alarm_sq.NEXTVAL , #{showSq} , #{startDate} , #{endDate}, #{seatClasss}, #{price}, 'Y', #{userSq} )
mapper.select: SELECT sc.seat_class AS seatclasss, s.show_sq AS showsq, TO_CHAR(sw.end_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS enddate, tb.hope_price AS price FROM ticket t INNER JOIN showing_seat ss ON t.showing_sq = ss.showing_sq AND t.ticket_seat = ss.showing_seat_no INNER JOIN seat_class sc ON ss.seat_class_sq = sc.seat_class_sq INNER JOIN showing sw ON ss.showing_sq = sw.showing_sq INNER JOIN show s ON sw.show_sq = s.show_sq INNER JOIN transfer_board tb ON t.ticket_sq = tb.ticket_sq WHERE t.ticket_sq = #{ticketSq}

SELECT a.transfer_alarm_sq AS transferalarmsq, a.show_sq AS showsq, b.show_name AS showname, a.start_date AS startdate, a.end_date AS enddate, a.seat AS seatclasss, a.price, a.transfer_alarm_stat AS transferalarmstat, a.user_sq AS usersq FROM transfer_alarm a JOIN show b ON a.show_sq = b.show_sq WHERE (TO_CHAR(a.start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < #{endDate} AND TO_CHAR(a.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > #{endDate}) AND a.price >= #{price} AND (a.show_sq = #{showSq} OR a.show_sq = 0 ) AND (a.seat LIKE '%'||#{seatClasss}||'%' OR a.seat LIKE '%ALL%') ORDER BY transfer_alarm_sq

SELECT a.transfer_alarm_sq AS transferalarmsq, b.show_name AS showname, TO_CHAR(a.start_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS startdate, TO_CHAR(a.end_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS enddate, a.seat AS seatclasss, a.price, a.transfer_alarm_stat AS transferalarmstat, a.user_sq AS usersq FROM transfer_alarm a INNER JOIN show b ON a.show_sq = b.show_sq WHERE user_sq = #{userSp} AND a.end_date > SYSDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification ( NOTIFICATION_SQ, RECIPIENTS, TRANSFER_BOARD_SQ, RECIPIENTS_TITLE, RECIPIENTS_CONTENT ) VALUES ( seq_notification_sq.NEXTVAL , #{userSq} , #{transferBoardSq} , #{showName} , #{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT notification_sq AS notificationsq, recipients, recipients_title AS recipientstitle, recipients_content AS recipientscontent, TO_CHAR(recipients_reg_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS recipientsregdate FROM notification WHERE recipients = #{userSp}
